about_the_game: A demo for Half-Life Decay: Solo Mission, featuring the first two missions of the mod. Contents may differ from final mod.

short_description: The first two missions of Half-Life Decay: Solo Mission, a new, upcoming fan-remake of the PS2 exclusive Half-Life expansion "Decay", with the goal of rebuilding the game from the ground up to function as a seamless, single-player experience.
